questions.question_text:
You are writing an RPL script to accept routes only from certain autonomous systems. Consider this code:
RP/0/RP0/CPU0:router(config-rpl)# if as-path in (ios-regex '.*77$')
RP/0/RP0/CPU0:router(config-rpl-if)# pass
RP/0/RP0/CPU0:router(config-rpl-if)# endif
If you apply this code to BGP filters, which effect does the code have on your router?

discussion.content: Agree with EdgardoAC. It should have been "if as-path in (ios-regex 'Ëœ.*77$') then", but focus on that part and you are golden.
If you only consider the portion 77$, which means the string has to end on 77, the other options are discarded.
I think it's meant to be (ios-regex "^.*77$")

questions.question_text: Which regular expression query modifier function indicates the start of a string?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is correct

comments.content: No. Just because D makes match BGP prefix set, but in question we are asked to make policy for the SUBNET prefix set.
It cannot be D since the VRf name does not match.

discussion.content:
D is correct

You do not need to send both communities. Only extended in needed.

A is Correct

Explanation:

 The router bgp command enters BGP configuration mode.
 The address-family vpnv4 command enters the IPv4 VPNv4 address family configuration mode.
 The neighbor 1.1.1.1 activate command activates the BGP neighborship with the neighbor 1.1.1.1.
 The neighbor 1.1.1.1 send-community both command enables the sending of both standard and extended communities to the neighbor 1.1.1.1.
 The exit-address-family command exits the IPv4 VPNv4 address family configuration mode.
 The address-family ipv4 vrf Internet_Shared_Service command enters the IPv4 address family configuration mode for the "Internet_Shared_Service" VRF.
 The no synchronization command disables synchronization between BGP and the IGP for this address family.
 The network 0.0.0.0 command injects the default route into the "Internet_Shared_Service" VRF.

Selected Answer: D
Router(config)# mpls ldp graceful-restart

questions.question_text: Which configuration mode do you use to apply the mpls ldp graceful-restart command in IOS XE Software?
